short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches and displays the KeKa time logs for exit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1) Overview: Keka Time Fetcher is an essential Chrome extension designed to help employees effortlessly track their attendance logs from the Keka HR platform. With just a single click, you can instantly view your effective working hours, check your overtime or pending hours, and stay on top of your attendance records.

2) Features:
- Instant Refresh: Quickly update your attendance logs to see the latest data.
- Detailed Overview: View your attendance history with a comprehensive table showing dates, effective hours, and status (Pending, Overtime).
- Color-Coded Status: Easily identify pending hours and overtime with color-coded highlights.
- User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design, making it simple for anyone to use.
- Support for Multiple Days: Scroll through multiple days' logs without needing to open the Keka portal manually.
- Privacy-Focused: No personal data is stored or sharedâ€”everything stays within your browser.

3) Benefits:
- Save time by accessing your attendance logs directly from the browser.
- Stay organized by keeping track of your working hours effortlessly.
- Improve productivity by monitoring your overtime and pending hours regularly.
